spell.spellbladenext.monkeyreflect.name: Rending Winds
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyreflect.descr: Spin up a gust of wind, dealing heavy knockback and {damage} physical damage per second to the target enemy.
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyslam.name: Head in the Clouds
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyslam.descript: Leap into the clouds, becoming invulnerable while channeling.
spell.spellbladenext.flameslash.name: Flaming Laceration
spell.spellbladenext.flameslash.descript: {damage} Fire DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting flaming, exploding projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.frostslash.name: Blade Flurry
spell.spellbladenext.frostslash.descript: {damage} Frost DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting bouncing, ricocheting blade projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.amethystslash.name: Amethyst Splash
spell.spellbladenext.amethystslash.descr: {damage} Arcane DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting piercing amethyst projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.finalstrike.name: Sonic Strike
spell.spellbladenext.finalstrike.descrip: Charge up a deadly attack against all enemies in a line, teleporting behind the last one and dealing 3x melee damage plus an additional {damage} arcane spell damage.
spell.spellbladenext.eviscerate.name: Massacre
spell.spellbladenext.eviscerate.descript: Become intangible, attacking the nearest multiple times over a second, dealing 2.5x melee dps plus an additional {damage} frost dps, scaling with attack speed. Refreshes on kill, jumping onto the nearest enemy.
spell.spellbladenext.whirlingblades.name: Riptide
spell.spellbladenext.whirlingblades.desc: Aim and launch yourself as if with a riptide-enchanted trident
spell.spellbladenext.flicker_strike.name: Flickering Flame
spell.spellbladenext.flicker_strike.desc: Jump onto nearby enemies equally, dealing 1x melee dps plus an additional {damage} fire dps, scaled by attack speed. Focuses on one target if there is only one target.
spell.spellbladenext.frostblink.name: Arcane Flicker
spell.spellbladenext.frostblink.descript: Teleport behind an enemy, dealing 1.5x melee damage plus an additional {damage} arcane damage.
spell.spellbladenext.frostvert.name: Rising Dragon Strike
spell.spellbladenext.frostvert.descripti: Attack enemies in front of you, dealing 1.5x melee damage plus an additional {damage} fire damage, gaining upwards momentum.
spell.spellbladenext.smite.name: Divine Smite
spell.spellbladenext.smite.description: Smite enemies in front of you in an area, dealing 1.5x attack damage and {damage} extra healing damage to each enemy hit, twice as much against undead.
spell.spellbladenext.maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
spell.spellbladenext.maelstrom.descripti: Spin continuously, dealing 1.5x your attack DPS, plus {damage} arcane DPS, multiplied by attack speed
spell.spellbladenext.inferno.name: Inferno
spell.spellbladenext.inferno.description: Spin continuously, dealing 1.5x your attack DPS, plus {damage} fire DPS, multiplied by attack speed
spell.spellbladenext.tempest.name: Tempest
spell.spellbladenext.tempest.description: Spin continuously, dealing 1.5x your attack DPS, plus {damage} frost DPS, multiplied by attack speed
spell.spellbladenext.whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
spell.spellbladenext.whirlwind.descripti: Spin continuously, dealing 1.5x your attack DPS.
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneflourish.name: Arcane Flourish
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneflourish.desc: Spin rapidly, dealing 1.5x your attack damage, plus {damage} arcane damage.
spell.spellbladenext.fireflourish.name: Fire Flourish
spell.spellbladenext.fireflourish.descri: Spin rapidly, dealing 1.5x your attack damage, plus {damage} fire damage.
spell.spellbladenext.frostflourish.name: Frost Flourish
spell.spellbladenext.frostflourish.descr: Spin rapidly, dealing 1.5x your attack damage, plus {damage} frost damage.
